title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.75 - Deferral (or deferment)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.75 - Deferral (or deferment)

State Regulations

The accounting treatment accorded the receipt or accrual
of revenue before it is earned, or the incurrence of an expenditure before the
benefits therefrom are received. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.75

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
